questions.questionText: 1) What is the correct HTML for adding a background color?
questions.explanation: You can set a background color for an HTML document by adding <body bgcolor='yellow'> to the <body> element.

questions.questionText: 2) Tags that are not directly displayed on the page are defined in the _____ section.
questions.explanation: The <head> tag in HTML is used to define the head portion of the document which contains information related to the document.

questions.questionText: 3) When should you use path along with file name of a picture in the tag?

options.text: When the path is optional and not necessary
When the location of the image file and html file are different
When the image file and html file both are in same location
When the path is always necessary when inserting the image

questions.explanation: Images are linked to web pages by using the tag and should inlcude the file path and name if the location of the image file and html file are different.

questions.questionText: 4) Which attribute merges two cells horizontally in the TD tag?
questions.explanation: The rowspan is used to merge or combine the number of cells in a row whereas the colspan is used to merge column cells in a table.

questions.questionText: 5) What is the correct HTML tag to make a text bold?
questions.explanation: The <b> tag specifies bold text without any extra importance.
